Landing.title: CoList
Landing.heroDescription: The event organizer that makes preparations as magical as the party itself.
Landing.feature1Description: Create your party menu in seconds. Organize dishes by courses (Appetizer, Main, Dessert) and track progress in real-time.
Landing.feature2Description: No more duplicates! Your guests choose directly what they want to bring. A clear interface for perfect coordination.
Landing.feature3Description: Let our AI generate the precise list of ingredients for each dish. No more last-minute grocery store runs.
Landing.feature4Description: A shared shopping list organized by person. Check off your items as you go, even without a connection.
Landing.ctaDescription: Join thousands of families already using CoList.
Landing.footer: ¬© 2025 CoList. Made with ‚ú® for your best moments.

LandingAlt.heroDescription: Gather your friends. Enjoy the moment without the mental load.
LandingAlt.feature1Description: Just say 'Lasagna for 12', CoList instantly generates the complete list of ingredients with exact quantities. No more recipe searching or complex calculations.
LandingAlt.feature2Description: The app adds everything up for you and creates the shopping list for each guest. The list is sorted and ready to be checked off at the store.
LandingAlt.feature3Description: Forget installations. Your loved ones receive a link and participate with one click: 'I'll bring the champagne', 'It's me!'. Instantly validated, without any registration.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.a1: Yes, CoList is 100% free for now. All features, including AI and unlimited invitations, are accessible at no cost.
FAQ.q2: Do my guests need to create an account?
FAQ.a2: No! That's our strength. They receive your link, click, and can indicate what they are bringing without any registration or app installation.
FAQ.q3: What if someone doesn't have a smartphone?
FAQ.a3: The link works on any browser (computer, tablet, smartphone). You can also manually add what Grandma is bringing if she's not connected.
FAQ.q4: How does the shopping list work?
FAQ.a4: The app compiles everything left to buy (what no one has taken yet) into a global list for the host, and creates a personalized list for each guest with their own contributions.
